traitor_lord.name: Traitor Lord
traitor_lord.description: A lord of the dark gods.

traitor_lord_on_bike.name: Traitor Lord on Bike
traitor_lord_on_bike.description: A lord of the dark gods riding a bike.

dark_psychic.name: Dark Psychic
dark_psychic.description: A powerful human whose mental powers have been twisted by the dark side.

dark_psychic_on_bike.name: Dark Psychic on Bike
dark_psychic_on_bike.description: A powerful human whose mental powers have been twisted by the dark side on a combat bike.

daemon_champion.name: Daemon Champion
daemon_champion.description: A massive daemon gifted in the art of war.

dark_priest.name: Dark Priest
dark_priest.description: A devotee of the dark gods who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

cultist_specialist.name: Cultist Specialist
cultist_specialist.description: Humans who have sold their souls to the dark gods.

cultist.name: Cultist
cultist.description: Humans who have sold their souls to the dark gods.

plague_walker.name: Plague Walker
plague_walker.description: Humans who have been mutated into walking undead.

traitor_marine_leader.name: Traitor Marine Leader
traitor_marine_leader.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

heavy_traitor_marine.name: Traitor Marine Heavy
heavy_traitor_marine.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

specialist_traitor_marine.name: Traitor Marine Specialist
specialist_traitor_marine.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

traitor_marine.name: Traitor Marine
traitor_marine.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

lord_of_pestilence.name: Lord of Pestilence
lord_of_pestilence.description: A lord of death and decay.

pestilence_psychic.name: Pestilence Psychic
pestilence_psychic.description: A powerful infected marine whose mental powers can be used for destruction.

pestilence_marine_leader.name: Pestilence Marine Leader
pestilence_marine_leader.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

specialist_pestilence_marine.name: Pestilence Marine Specialist
specialist_pestilence_marine.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_marine.name: Pestilence Marine
pestilence_marine.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_destroyer.name: Pestilence Destroyer
pestilence_destroyer.description: Destroyers that are infected with pestilence.

pestilence_elite_destroyer.name: Pestilence Elite Destroyer
pestilence_elite_destroyer.description: Destroyers that are infected with pestilence.

traitor_berzerker_leader.name: Traitor Berzerker Leader
traitor_berzerker_leader.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods filled with rage.

heavy_traitor_berzerker.name: Traitor Berzerker Specialst
heavy_traitor_berzerker.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods filled with rage.

traitor_berzerker.name: Traitor Berzerker
traitor_berzerker.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods filled with rage.

traitor_devastator_leader.name: Traitor Devastator Leader
traitor_devastator_leader.description: A squad of highly trained traitor marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

traitor_devastator.name: Traitor Devastator
traitor_devastator.description: A squad of highly trained traitor marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

possessed_brother.name: Possessed Traitor
possessed_brother.description: A squad of traitor marines that have been gifted with daemonic mutations to aid them in battle.

greater_possessed_brother.name: Greater Possessed Brother
greater_possessed_brother.description: A squad of traitor marines that have been gifted with significant daemonic mutations to aid them in battle.

talon_raptor_leader.name: Talon Raptor Leader
talon_raptor_leader.description: A squad of elite traitor marines intent on achieving melee carnage.

specialist_talon_raptor.name: Talon Raptor Specialist
specialist_talon_raptor.description: A squad of elite traitor marines intent on achieving melee carnage.

talon_raptor.name: Talon Raptor
talon_raptor.description: A squad of elite traitor marines intent on achieving melee carnage.

havoc_destoyer.name: Traitor Destroyer
havoc_destoyer.description: Destroyers that have been corrupted by the dark gods.

mutated_destoyer.name: Mutated Destroyer
mutated_destoyer.description: Destroyers that have been corrupted by the dark gods and have been gifted with extra mutations to aid them in battle.

daemon_spawn.name: Daemon Spawn
daemon_spawn.description: Horribly mutated beings that run rampant on the battlefield.

sorcerer_lord.name: Sorcerer Lord
sorcerer_lord.description: A master of combat that leads the forces of change.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: A distinguished sorcerer who has managed to rise through the ranks of the change brothers.

birdman_sorcerer.name: Birdman Sorcerer
birdman_sorcerer.description: A mutated half bird half man sorcerer that leads demonic forces of change.

change_traitor_leader.name: Psychic Traitor Marine Leader
change_traitor_leader.description: Hexed traitor marines whose bodies have been turned to dust by a horrible curse, but fight on as mindless automatons in their remaining armor.

heavy_change_traitor.name: Psychic Traitor Marine Heavy
heavy_change_traitor.description: Hexed traitor marines whose bodies have been turned to dust by a horrible curse, but fight on as mindless automatons in their remaining armor.

change_traitors.name: Psychic Traitor Marines
change_traitors.description: Hexed traitor marines whose bodies have been turned to dust by a horrible curse, but fight on as mindless automatons in their remaining armor.

change_destroyer_leader.name: Psychic Destroyer Leader
change_destroyer_leader.description: Change brothers in destroyer amror suffering from the same curse as their brothers, but still fight stolidly by their side.

change_destroyer.name: Psychic Destroyer
change_destroyer.description: Change brothers in destroyer amror suffering from the same curse as their brothers, but still fight stolidly by their side.

birdmen_leader.name: Birdman Leader
birdmen_leader.description: Mutated half bird half man creatures that fight with the change brothers to acheive their goals.

birdman.name: Birdman
birdman.description: Mutated half bird half man creatures that fight with the change brothers to acheive their goals.

doom_siren.name: Doom Siren
doom_siren.description: Enemy units within 6" of this model suffer -1 Courage.

rifle_tactics.name: Rifle Tactics
rifle_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly Infantry units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

melee_tactics.name: Melee Tactics
melee_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly Infantry units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

archmage_tactics.name: Arch-Psyker's Tactics
archmage_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly units with the Power special rule within 6".  Those units may reroll dice rolls of 9+ while using the Power ability until the end of the round.

archmage.name: Blessings of the Psyker God
archmage.description: When this unit casts the Shock Wave Power, double the number of hits it deals.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: This weapon ignores cover and may choose the model that is hit.

psychic_helmet.name: Psychic Helmet
psychic_helmet.description: The bearer gets +1 to all Psychic tests.

war_chant.name: War Chant
war_chant.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 3" gain the Furious keyword.

hate.name: Hate
hate.flavor: Full with fury, traitor marines can launch devastating close combat assaults.
hate.description: Use before an Infantry unit fights. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

daemonforge.name: Daemonforge
daemonforge.flavor: Imbued with demonic energy, traitor vehicles can call upon the powers of the dark gods.
daemonforge.description: Use before a _Vehicle_ unit is targeted by an attack. Roll a D10 for each hit. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
fearless.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

concealment.name: Concealment
concealment.flavor: Traitor marines are sometimes trained in stealth tactics allowing them to hide even in plain sight.
concealment.description: Use this strategy when a unit is targeted by an enemy Shooting attack. That unit gets -1 Accuracy this attack.

infiltrate.name: Infiltrate
infiltrate.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in Ambush before the game begins. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated while in reserves, you may choose a point on the battlefield 12" away from any enemy units and take an Initiative check. If passed, place the unit at that location on the location. If failed, use D10 scattering to determine the landing location of the unit relative to the chosen point.
infiltrate.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

decoy.name: Decoy
decoy.description: Use after a _Leader_ unit has been targeted by a Shooting attack within 6" of a friendly _Infantry_ unit. For this attack, you can roll a D10 each time an attack made with a ranged weapon hits that unit. On an 8 or less a hit is transferred to the _Infantry_ unit instead of the original target.
decoy.flavor: Unsure of which is the real leader, enemies often get confused and shoot a different target.

psychic_channeling.name: Psychic Channeling
psychic_channeling.flavor: With focus and energy, even the most difficult psychic powers can be manifested.
psychic_channeling.description: Use before a unit rolls for casting a psychic power. The spell charge value is increased by 1 and the spell has +6" of range.

hex_rounds.name: Hex Rounds
hex_rounds.flavor: Sometimes used, hex rounds are imbued with psychic fire and are highly deadly.
hex_rounds.description: Use before an Infantry unit shoots. Add +6" to the short and long range bands of all weapons.

cursed_form.name: Cursed Form
cursed_form.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ unit. It gets +1 Save.
cursed_form.flavor: Psychic Traitors, cursed with the loss of their souls, they are less susceptible to damage.

resilience.name: Resilience
resilience.flavor: These marines are so diseased and rotten that they often shrug off some powerful attacks.
resilience.description: Use this strategy when one of your units is targeted by an attack. Roll a die for each hit, on a 3 or less that hit is prevented.

pestilent_aura.name: Pestilent Aura
pestilent_aura.flavor: Following these marines is an aura of death and disease.
pestilent_aura.description: Use this strategy when you activate one of your _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ units. Up to 2 units within 6" take 3 hits with AP 1 each.

pestilence_rounds.name: Pestilence Rounds
pestilence_rounds.flavor: Sometimes it is necessary to infuse marine rifle rounds with disease to cause extra damage.
pestilence_rounds.description: Use this strategy when one of your _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ units Shoots. Choose a weapon name. Each successful hit roll of 2 or less with that weapon gets +1 AP.

beam.name: Invigorating Beam
beam.description: Target friendly unit within 12"may immediately make a free move action.

magic_shield.name: Shield
magic_shield.description: Target friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.

weakness.name: Weakness
weakness.description: Target enemy unit within 18" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Save test.

illusion.name: Encroaching Mutations
illusion.description: Target enemy unit within 18" gets -1 to hit the next time it shoots or fights.

strike.name: Strike
strike.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 2 hits with AP 5.

terror.name: Terror
terror.description: Target enemy unit within 12" immediately takes 3 Shock.

death.name: Bolt
death.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 1 hit with AP 7.

storm.name: Storm
storm.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 5 hits with AP 1.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP 3.
